org.sakaiproject.content.api

Interface FilePickerHelper


  • public interface FilePickerHelper

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Integer CARDINALITY_MULTIPLE
      A constant indicating any the number of attachments is unlimited.
      static Integer CARDINALITY_SINGLE
      A constant indicating maximum of one item can be attached.
      static String DEFAULT_COLLECTION_ID
      The name of the state or tool-session attribute indicating the id of the collection that should be shown as the default location to look for attachments for a particular invocation of the filepicker.
      static String FILE_PICKER_ATTACH_LINKS
      The name of the state or tool-session attribute indicating that the file picker should return links to existing resources in an existing collection rather than copying them to the hidden attachments area.
      static String FILE_PICKER_ATTACHMENTS
      Name of the attribute used in the tool session or state to pass a List of References back and forth to the picker.
      static String FILE_PICKER_CANCEL
      Name of the attribute used in the tool session to tell the consumer if this resulted in a cancel.
      static String FILE_PICKER_FROM_TEXT
      Deprecated. 
      use FILE_PICKER_TITLE_TEXT and FILE_PICKER_INSTRUCTION_TEXT instead
      static String FILE_PICKER_INSTRUCTION_TEXT
      The name of the tool-session or state attribute for the instructions when a tool uses Resources as attachment helper (for create or attach but not for edit mode).
      static String FILE_PICKER_MAX_ATTACHMENTS
      The name of the tool-session or state attribute for the maximum number of items to attach.
      static String FILE_PICKER_RESOURCE_FILTER
      State or Tool-Session Attribute for the ContentResourceFilter object that the current filter should honor.
      static String FILE_PICKER_SHOW_DROPBOXES
      The name of the state or tool-session attribute indicating that dropboxes should be shown as places from which to select attachments.
      static String FILE_PICKER_SHOW_URL
      The name of the state or tool-session attribute indicating that there should be a widget to enable a URL to be specified as a place from which to select attachments.
      static String FILE_PICKER_SHOW_WORKSPACE
      The name of the state or tool-session attribute indicating that the current user's workspace Resources collection should be shown as places from which to select attachments.
      static String FILE_PICKER_SUBTITLE_TEXT
      Not yet implemented.
      static String FILE_PICKER_TITLE_TEXT
      title for the file selection helper (Corresponds to ResourcesAction.STATE_ATTACH_TITLE)
      static String LINKING_ENTITY
      The name of the optional tool-session attribute containing the reference string for the entity from which attachments will be referenced.
      static String PREFIX 
      static String START_HELPER
      this variable is used to tell the helper to initialize.

    • Field Detail

      • PREFIX

        static final String PREFIX
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FILE_PICKER_ATTACHMENTS

        static final String FILE_PICKER_ATTACHMENTS
        Name of the attribute used in the tool session or state to pass a List of References back and forth to the picker. (Corresponds to ResourcesAction.STATE_ATTACHMENTS)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FILE_PICKER_ATTACH_LINKS

        static final String FILE_PICKER_ATTACH_LINKS
        The name of the state or tool-session attribute indicating that the file picker should return links to existing resources in an existing collection rather than copying them to the hidden attachments area. If this value is not set, all attachments are to copies in the hidden attachments area.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FILE_PICKER_MAX_ATTACHMENTS

        static final String FILE_PICKER_MAX_ATTACHMENTS
        The name of the tool-session or state attribute for the maximum number of items to attach. The attribute value will be an Integer, usually CARDINALITY_SINGLE or CARDINALITY_MULTIPLE. (corresponds to ResourcesAction.STATE_ATTACH_CARDINALITY)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CARDINALITY_SINGLE

        static final Integer CARDINALITY_SINGLE
        A constant indicating maximum of one item can be attached.

      • CARDINALITY_MULTIPLE

        static final Integer CARDINALITY_MULTIPLE
        A constant indicating any the number of attachments is unlimited.

      • FILE_PICKER_TITLE_TEXT

        static final String FILE_PICKER_TITLE_TEXT
        title for the file selection helper (Corresponds to ResourcesAction.STATE_ATTACH_TITLE)
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FILE_PICKER_INSTRUCTION_TEXT

        static final String FILE_PICKER_INSTRUCTION_TEXT
        The name of the tool-session or state attribute for the instructions when a tool uses Resources as attachment helper (for create or attach but not for edit mode). (Corresponds to ResourcesAction.STATE_ATTACH_INSTRUCTION).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FILE_PICKER_RESOURCE_FILTER

        static final String FILE_PICKER_RESOURCE_FILTER
        State or Tool-Session Attribute for the ContentResourceFilter object that the current filter should honor. If this is set to null, then all files will be selectable and viewable. (Corresponds to ResourcesAction.STATE_RESOURCE_FILTER).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FILE_PICKER_CANCEL

        static final String FILE_PICKER_CANCEL
        Name of the attribute used in the tool session to tell the consumer if this resulted in a cancel. This will be "true" or non-existent (Corresponds to ResourcesAction.STATE_HELPER_CANCELED_BY_USER).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FILE_PICKER_FROM_TEXT

        static final String FILE_PICKER_FROM_TEXT
        Deprecated. use FILE_PICKER_TITLE_TEXT and FILE_PICKER_INSTRUCTION_TEXT instead
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FILE_PICKER_SUBTITLE_TEXT

        static final String FILE_PICKER_SUBTITLE_TEXT
        Not yet implemented.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FILE_PICKER_SHOW_DROPBOXES

        static final String FILE_PICKER_SHOW_DROPBOXES
        The name of the state or tool-session attribute indicating that dropboxes should be shown as places from which to select attachments. The value should be a List of user-id's. The file picker will attempt to show the dropbox for each user whose id is included in the list.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FILE_PICKER_SHOW_WORKSPACE

        static final String FILE_PICKER_SHOW_WORKSPACE
        The name of the state or tool-session attribute indicating that the current user's workspace Resources collection should be shown as places from which to select attachments. The value should be "true". The file picker will attempt to show the dropbox for each user whose id is included in the list.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • FILE_PICKER_SHOW_URL

        static final String FILE_PICKER_SHOW_URL
        The name of the state or tool-session attribute indicating that there should be a widget to enable a URL to be specified as a place from which to select attachments. The value corresponding should be of type Boolean.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_COLLECTION_ID

        static final String DEFAULT_COLLECTION_ID
        The name of the state or tool-session attribute indicating the id of the collection that should be shown as the default location to look for attachments for a particular invocation of the filepicker.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • START_HELPER

        static final String START_HELPER
        this variable is used to tell the helper to initialize. this is optional in most cases
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LINKING_ENTITY

        static final String LINKING_ENTITY
        The name of the optional tool-session attribute containing the reference string for the entity from which attachments will be referenced. If this value is supplied when invoking the file-picker, it will be saved as a ResourceProperty value of all attachments created during the helper's activity.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values
